description: test: run some more tests by default

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

rotate uses huge amounts of memory to compile, most ARM builders will not be able to build it. Can we check that before?

Maybe it should be split in passes like we do for index.go.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1e04cb236c3b ***

test: run some more tests by default

R=golang-dev, remyoudompheng, iant, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6833043

On Wed, Nov 7, 2012 at 1:08 PM,  <remyoudompheng@gmail.com> wrote:
> rotate uses huge amounts of memory to compile, most ARM builders will
> not be able to build it. Can we check that before?

Good point, and it even says so.  I dropped it from this CL.

Ian

subject: code review 6833043: test: run some more tests by default
